name: Animal Hospital
description:
Welcome to the Animal Hospital... We hope you enjoy your stay, and find all of our therapy sessions enriching and uplifting...

CONTENT WARNING (PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING GAME)

  • this game contains low rumbling frequencies at certain points. if you have any issues with this, please either turn your sound off while playing or refrain from downloading the game.
  • this game contains ableist language, implied sexual assault, mild blood, and implied murder. if any of these things bother you, please refrain from downloading this game.
